articles.description: All the latest football news and EFL Cup reaction as Tottenham reach the semi-finals of the competition.
articles.title: EFL Cup reaction: Tottenham beat Manchester United in dramatic quarter-final

articles.description: Goalkeepers Fraser Forster and Altay Bayindir both have a night to forget during Tottenham's 4-3 win over Manchester United.
articles.title: Tottenham 4-3 Man Utd: Fraser Forster & Altay Bayindir questioned after mistakes

articles.description: From champion Oleksandr Usyk's unwanted 5am wake-ups to Tyson Fury's short-lived humbleness, BBC Sport previews Saturday's heavyweight blockbuster.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Heavyweight rivalry for the ages continues in Saudi Arabia on Saturday

articles.description: Marc Guiu, 18, could be a "big star" for Chelsea after scoring a hat-trick against Shamrock Rovers in the Conference League.
articles.title: Marc Guiu: Chelsea striker showing Barcelona's 'mistake' is Blues' gain

articles.description: Farhad Moshiri says the end of his Everton ownership leaves him with "mixed emotions" and he wonders where the club might have been had Carlo Ancelotti remained.
articles.title: Everton takeover: Farhad Moshiri ponders Carlo Ancelotti possibilities as fan groups look to future after Friedkin Group buy Merseyside club

articles.description: Tomas Cosgrove believes Larne's first Uefa Conference League victory can be a catalyst for the rest of their season.
articles.title: Larne 1-0 Gent: Winner against Gent a childhood dream for Tomas Cosgrove

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Reverend & the Makers singer Jon McClure with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Reverend & the Makers singer Jon McClure.

articles.description: Frenchman Isack Hadjar is promoted to Red Bull's second team to race alongside Japanese Yuki Tsunoda during the 2025 Formula 1 season.
articles.title: Formula 1: Isack Hadjar to race for Racing Bulls

articles.description: LeBron James breaks the record for most minutes played in NBA history as he helps the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Sacramento Kings 113-100.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James sets new record in Los Angeles Lakers win over Sacramento Kings

articles.description: Tom Ilube steps down as Rugby Football Union chairman, pre-empting the possibility of a grassroots rebellion forcing him out over executive bonuses.
articles.title: RFU pay row: Tom Ilube steps down as chair
